news.title: Fusion startup Helion hits blistering temps as it races toward 2028 deadline
news.summary: Helion's Polaris device hit 150 million degrees C recently, a milestone that nudges the company toward its commercial power plant that will sell electricity to Microsoft.

news.title: IBM will hire your entry-level talent in the age of AI
